005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
012
013public interface INamedModelInstanceAbsolute extends INamedModelInstance, IModelInstanceAbsolute {
014  @Override
015  default String getJsonName() {
016    @NonNull
017    String retval;
018    if (getMaxOccurs() == -1 || getMaxOccurs() > 1) {
019      @NonNull
020      String groupAsName = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(getGroupAsName(),
021          ObjectUtils.notNull(String.format("null group-as name in instance '%s' on definition '%s' in '%s'",
022              this.getName(),
023              this.getContainingDefinition().getName(),
024              this.getContainingModule().getLocation())));
025      retval = groupAsName;
026    } else {
027      retval = getEffectiveName();
028    }
029    return retval;
030  }
031
032  @Override
033  @Nullable
034  default IFlagInstance getEffectiveJsonKey() {
035    return JsonGroupAsBehavior.KEYED.equals(getJsonGroupAsBehavior())
036        ? getJsonKey()
037        : null;
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  @Nullable
042  default IFlagInstance getJsonKey() {
043    return getDefinition().getJsonKey();
044  }
045}
